name: Spidarcade
description:
Spidarcade is an arcade inspired rougelike shoot-em up spider game, where you play as an itsy-bitsy spider trying to claim his spot at the top of the web-chain. Defeat enemy spiders and grow stronger to climb to the very top!

Made for the Mini Jam 123: Web!

Controls: 

W - Forward
Q + E - Use abilities
Mouse to Aim
Space to detach/attach to web

Tips!

1: You're invincible while detached from the web! Just don't forget to re-attach or you may fall to your death!

2: You can shoot whilst falling! Useful for clearing enemies when you're surrounded!

Made By: 

DannyWebbie - Game Lead & Programmer & Artist (Itch.io)
Kinematics - Programmer (Itch.io)
MishimaDev - Game Designer (Itch.io)
